TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OleDbConnection : System.Data.Common.DbConnection, ICloneable, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbConnection extends System.Data.Common.DbConnection implements class System.Data.IDbConnection, class System.ICloneable, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbConnection Inherits DbConnection Implements ICloneable, IDisposable
public ref class OleDbConnection sealed : System::Data::Common::DbConnection, ICloneable, IDisposable

summary.span: 表示到数据源的连接是打开的。

span.span: Represents an open connection to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示与数据源的唯一连接。An object represents a unique connection to a data source. 使用客户端/服务器数据库系统，它相当于网络连接到服务器。With a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server. 具体取决于本机 OLE DB 访问接口、 某个方法或属性的支持的功能对象可能不可用。Depending on the functionality supported by the native OLE DB provider, some methods or properties of an object may not be available. 创建的实例时，所有属性都设置为其初始值。When you create an instance of , all properties are set to their initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 您可以打开多个 DataReader 的单个。You can open more than one DataReader on a single . 如果您使用的 OLE DB 访问接口不支持在单个连接上多个 DataReader，提供程序将为每个隐式打开其他连接。If the OLE DB provider you use does not support more than one DataReader on a single connection, the provider implicitly opens an additional connection for each. 如果超出范围，它没有闭合。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用或**Dispose**，或使用对象内`Using`语句。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling or **Dispose**, or by using the object within a `Using` statement. > [!NOTE] > 若要部署高性能应用程序，必须使用连接池。To deploy high-performance applications, you must use connection pooling. 当用于 OLE DB 使用.NET Framework 数据提供程序时，您无需启用连接池，因为提供程序会自动管理。When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically. 详细了解如何使用连接池与.NET Framework 数据提供程序用于 OLE DB，请参阅[OLE DB、 ODBC 和 Oracle 连接池](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ole-db-odbc-and-oracle-connection-pooling.md)。For more information about how to use connection pooling with the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB, see [OLE DB, ODBC, and Oracle Connection Pooling](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ole-db-odbc-and-oracle-connection-pooling.md). 如果严重(例如，SQL Server 严重级别为 20 或更高版本） 生成的方法执行，则可能已关闭。If a fatal (for example, a SQL Server severity level of 20 or greater) is generated by the method executing an , the might be closed. 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 创建的实例的应用程序对象可以要求所有直接和间接调用方拥有足够的权限的代码通过设置声明性或命令性安全要求。An application that creates an instance of the object can require all direct and indirect callers to have sufficient permission to the code by setting declarative or imperative security demands. 可以使用的安全要求对象。 makes security demands using the object. 用户可以验证其代码通过使用具有足够的权限对象。Users can verify that their code has sufficient permissions by using the object. 用户和管理员还可以使用[Caspol.exe （代码访问安全策略工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)修改计算机、 用户和企业级别的安全策略。Users and administrators can also use the [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md) to modify security policy at the computer, user, and enterprise levels. 有关更多信息，请参见 [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。For more information, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md). 有关处理来自数据服务器的警告和信息性消息的详细信息，请参阅[连接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information about handling warning and informational messages from the data server, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md). > [!NOTE] > 对象不支持设置或检索特定于 OLE DB 访问接口的动态属性。The object does not support setting or retrieving dynamic properties specific to an OLE DB provider. 只支持可在 OLE DB 提供程序连接字符串中传递的属性。Only properties that can be passed in the connection string for the OLE DB provider are supported. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates an and an . 打开，并设置为为。The is opened and set as the for the . 该示例然后调用和关闭连接。The example then calls and closes the connection. 若要实现此目的，传递连接字符串和一个 SQL INSERT 语句的查询字符串。To accomplish this, is passed a connection string and a query string that is an SQL INSERT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 开始数据库事务。

span.span: Starts a database transaction.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.OleDb.OleDbTransaction BeginTransaction() cil managed

summary.span: 以当前的 值开始数据库事务。

span.span: Starts a database transaction with the current value.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必须显式提交或回滚事务使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要确保正确执行.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 事务管理模型，请避免使用其他事务管理模型，如所提供的数据源。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the data source. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates an and an . 它还演示了如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Parallel transactions are not supported.
Connecting to Data Sources

param.span: 事务应在其下运行的隔离级别。

span.span: The isolation level under which the transaction should run.

summary.span: 以指定的隔离级别启动数据库事务。

span.span: Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必须显式提交或回滚事务使用或方法。You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the or method. 若要确保正确执行.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 事务管理模型，请避免使用其他事务管理模型，如所提供的数据源。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the data source. > [!NOTE] > 如果不指定隔离级别，使用基础提供程序的默认隔离级别。If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level for the underlying provider is used. 若要指定隔离级别，其中方法中，使用的重载的`isolationLevel`参数。To specify an isolation level with the method, use the overload that takes the `isolationLevel` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates an and an . 它还演示了如何使用、 一个，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , a , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.BeginTransaction1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ChangeDatabase(string value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ChangeDatabase (value As String)

span.span: The database name.

summary.span: 更改已打开的 的当前数据库。

span.span: Changes the current database for an open .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中提供的值`database`参数必须是有效的数据库名称。The value supplied in the `database` parameter must be a valid database name. `database`参数不能包含 null 值、 空字符串或仅有空白字符的字符串。The `database` parameter cannot contain a null value, an empty string, or a string with only blank characters. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并显示它的一些只读属性。The following example creates an and displays some of its read-only properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Database Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Database Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Database Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Database Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: The database name is not valid.
The connection is not open.
Cannot change the database.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭到数据源的连接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回滚所有挂起的事务。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然后释放到连接池连接，或如果禁用连接池时关闭连接。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 如果调用时处理事件，无需额外的事件触发。If is called while handling a event, no additional events are fired. 应用程序可以调用不止一次。An application can call more than one time. 不会生成异常。No exception is generated. > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用或**释放**上，则，或在任何其他托管的对象`Finalize`类的方法。Do not call or **Dispose** on an , an , or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，您应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ConnectionString { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property ConnectionString As String

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.ADO.Design.OleDbConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.ADO.Design.OleDbConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.ADO.Design.OleDbConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于打数据库的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open a database.

value.span: OLE DB 提供程序连接字符串，它包括建立初始连接所必需的数据源名称和其他参数。

span.span: The OLE DB provider connection string that includes the data source name, and other parameters needed to establish the initial connection.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 旨在符合 OLE DB 连接字符串的格式为尽可能有以下例外：The is designed to match OLE DB connection string format as closely as possible with the following exceptions: - "提供程序 = `value` "子句是必需的。The "Provider = `value` " clause is required. 但是，不能使用"提供程序 = MSDASQL"因为 OLE DB 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持 OLE DB Provider for ODBC (MSDASQL)。However, you cannot use "Provider = MSDASQL" because the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB does not support the OLE DB Provider for ODBC (MSDASQL). 若要访问 ODBC 数据源，请使用对象，它是在命名空间。To access ODBC data sources, use the object that is in the namespace. - 不同于 ODBC 或 ADO，则返回的连接字符串是与用户设置相同，减去安全信息如果`Persist Security Info`设置为`false`（默认值）。Unlike ODBC or ADO, the connection string that is returned is the same as the user-set , minus security information if `Persist Security Info` is set to `false` (default). 用于 OLE DB.NET Framework 数据提供程序不会持久保存或连接字符串中返回密码，除非您设置`Persist Security Info`关键字`true`（不推荐）。The .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB does not persist or return the password in a connection string unless you set the `Persist Security Info` keyword to `true` (not recommended). 若要维护高级别的安全性，强烈建议你使用`Integrated Security`关键字`Persist Security Info`设置为`false`。To maintain a high level of security, it is strongly recommended that you use the `Integrated Security` keyword with `Persist Security Info` set to `false`. 可以使用属性，以连接到各种数据源。You can use the property to connect to a variety of data sources. 下面的示例说明了几个可能的连接字符串。The following example illustrates several possible connection strings. ``` "Provider=MSDAORA; Data Source=ORACLE8i7;Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=Yes" "Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0; Data Source=c:\bin\LocalAccess40.mdb" "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=(local);Integrated Security=SSPI" ``` 如果`Data Source`关键字未指定连接字符串中，则提供程序将尝试连接到本地服务器，如果有可用。If the `Data Source` keyword is not specified in the connection string, the provider will try to connect to the local server if one is available. 有关连接字符串的详细信息，请参阅[将连接字符串关键字用于 SQL Server Native Client](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=126696)。For more information about connection strings, see [Using Connection String Keywords with SQL Server Native Client](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=126696). 仅当连接关闭时，可以设置属性。The property can be set only when the connection is closed. 许多连接字符串值都有相应的只读属性。Many of the connection string values have corresponding read-only properties. 设置连接字符串时，会更新这些属性，除非检测到错误。When the connection string is set, these properties are updated, except when an error is detected. 在这种情况下，不会更新任何属性。In this case, none of the properties are updated. 属性返回中包含的那些设置。 properties return only those settings that are contained in the . 重置关闭的连接将重置所有连接字符串值和相关的属性。Resetting the on a closed connection resets all connection string values and related properties. 这包括密码。This includes the password. 例如，如果设置包含的连接字符串"Initial Catalog = AdventureWorks"，然后重置的连接字符串"提供程序 = SQLOLEDB; 数据源 = MySQLServer; IntegratedSecurity = SSPI"，则属性不再设置为AdventureWorks。For example, if you set a connection string that includes "Initial Catalog= AdventureWorks", and then reset the connection string to "Provider= SQLOLEDB;Data Source= MySQLServer;IntegratedSecurity=SSPI", the property is no longer set to AdventureWorks. (连接字符串的初始目录值对应于`Database`属性。)(The Initial Catalog value of the connection string corresponds to the `Database` property.) 将属性设置时执行的连接字符串的初始验证。A preliminary validation of the connection string is performed when the property is set. 如果值为`Provider`， `Connect Timeout`， `Persist Security Info`，或`OLE DB Services`包含在字符串中，检查这些值。If values for the `Provider`, `Connect Timeout`, `Persist Security Info`, or `OLE DB Services` are included in the string, these values are checked. 当应用程序调用完全验证方法中，连接字符串。When an application calls the method, the connection string is fully validated. 如果连接字符串包含无效或不受支持属性中，运行时异常，如，生成。If the connection string contains invalid or unsupported properties, a run-time exception, such as , is generated. > [!CAUTION] > 它是可以提供连接信息在通用数据链接 (UDL) 文件中; 但是您应避免这样做。It is possible to supply connection information for an in a Universal Data Link (UDL) file; however you should avoid doing so. UDL 文件未加密，并公开以明文形式的连接字符串信息。UDL files are not encrypted and expose connection string information in clear text. 因为 UDL 文件对您的应用程序来说是一个基于文件的外部资源，所以无法使用 .NET Framework 保护该文件。Because a UDL file is an external file-based resource to your application, it cannot be secured using the .NET Framework. 连接字符串的基本格式包含一系列的关键字/值对之间用分号分隔。The basic format of a connection string includes a series of keyword/value pairs separated by semicolons. 每个关键字和它的值之间用等号 (=) 连接。The equal sign (=) connects each keyword and its value. 若要包含的值包含分号、 单引号字符或双引号字符，则该值必须括在双引号。To include values that contain a semicolon, single-quote character, or double-quote character, the value must be enclosed in double quotation marks. 如果值包含分号和双引号字符，则该值可以用单引号引起来。If the value contains both a semicolon and a double-quote character, the value can be enclosed in single quotation marks. 单引号还是双引号字符开头的值的情况下很有用。The single quotation mark is also useful if the value starts with a double-quote character. 相反，如果的值以单引号开头，则可以使用双引号。Conversely, the double quotation mark can be used if the value starts with a single quotation mark. 如果值包含单引号和双引号字符，用于将值括起来的引号字符必须成对每次它发生时的值中出现。If the value contains both single-quote and double-quote characters, the quotation-mark character used to enclose the value must be doubled every time it occurs within the value. 中的字符串值包含前导或尾随空格，则该值必须括在单引号或双引号引起来。To include preceding or trailing spaces in the string value, the value must be enclosed in either single quotation marks or double quotation marks. 周围的整数、 布尔值或枚举的值的任何前导或尾随空格将被忽略，即使用引号括起来。Any leading or trailing spaces around integer, Boolean, or enumerated values are ignored, even if enclosed in quotation marks. 但是，会保留空格的字符串字面常数关键字或值中。However, spaces within a string literal keyword or value are preserved. 而不使用分隔符，可能的连接字符串中使用单引号或双引号括起来 (例如，`Data Source= my'Server`或`Data Source= my"Server`) 如果英文引号连用字符不是值中的第一个或最后一个字符。Single or double quotation marks may be used within a connection string without using delimiters (for example, `Data Source= my'Server` or `Data Source= my"Server`) unless a quotation-mark character is the first or last character in the value. 若要在关键字或值中包含等号 （=），它的前面必须通过另一个等号。To include an equal sign (=) in a keyword or value, it must be preceded by another equal sign. 例如，在假设的连接字符串For example, in the hypothetical connection string ``` "key==word=value" ``` 关键字是"键 = word"，值为"value"。the keyword is "key=word" and the value is "value". 如果关键字中的特定关键字 = 的值对中出现多次连接字符串中设置的值使用列出的最后一个匹配项。If a specific keyword in a keyword=value pair occurs multiple times in a connection string, the last occurrence listed is used in the value set. 关键字不区分大小写。Keywords are not case sensitive. > [!CAUTION] > 构造基于用户输入，例如，从一个对话框，将其追加到连接字符串检索用户 ID 和密码信息时的连接字符串时应十分小心。You should use caution when constructing a connection string based on user input, for example, when retrieving user ID and password information from a dialog box and appending it to the connection string. 应用程序应确保用户不能嵌入其他的连接字符串参数中的这些值，例如，输入密码作为"validpassword; database = somedb"尝试附加到不同的数据库中。The application should make sure that a user cannot embed additional connection-string parameters in these values, for example, entering a password as "validpassword;database= somedb" in an attempt to attach to a different database. 如果使用 OLE DB 连接的扩展属性连接字符串参数，避免传递用户 Id 和密码，因为您应该避免存储用户 Id 和密码以明文形式，并且默认设置的`Persist Security Info= false`不影响`Extended Properties`参数。If you use the Extended Properties connection string parameter for OLE DB connections, avoid passing user IDs and passwords because you should avoid storing user IDs and passwords in clear text if you can, and because the default setting of `Persist Security Info= false` does not affect the `Extended Properties` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和连接字符串中设置的某些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties in the connection string. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.DataSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.DataSource Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.DataSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.DataSource Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 提供了无效的连接字符串参数或未提供所需的连接字符串参数。

span.span: An invalid connection string argument has been supplied or a required connection string argument has not been supplied.

summary.span: 获取终止尝试并生成错误之前在尝试建立连接时所等待的时间。

span.span: Gets the time to wait while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

value.span: 等待连接打开的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time in seconds to wait for a connection to open.
The default value is 15 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为 0 表示没有限制，并应避免在因为连接尝试将无限期等待。A value of 0 indicates no limit, and should be avoided in a because an attempt to connect will wait indefinitely. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和连接字符串中设置的某些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties in the connection string. Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Database As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Database { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.

value.span: 当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

span.span: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会动态更新。The property updates dynamically. 如果您更改当前数据库使用 SQL 语句或方法发送一条信息性消息和自动更新的属性。If you change the current database using a SQL statement or the method, an informational message is sent and the property is updated automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并显示它的一些只读属性。The following example creates an and displays some of its read-only properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Database Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Database Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Database Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Database Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property DataSource As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取数据源的服务器名或文件名。

span.span: Gets the server name or file name of the data source.

value.span: 数据源的服务器名或文件名。

span.span: The server name or file name of the data source.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据库的连接已关闭，`DataSource`属性返回中包含的任何内容`ConnectionString`为数据源的关键字。If the connection to the database is closed, the `DataSource` property returns whatever is contained in `ConnectionString` for the data source keyword. 如果连接已打开并`ConnectionString`数据源关键字值以开始"|datadirectory|"，该属性返回中包含的任何内容`ConnectionString`为数据源关键字。If the connection is open and the `ConnectionString` data source keyword's value starts with "|datadirectory|", the property returns whatever is contained in `ConnectionString` for the data source keyword only. 如果数据库的连接处于打开状态，该属性返回的本机提供程序返回有关`DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE,`如果为空，本机提供程序的`DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME`返回。If the connection to the database is open, the property returns what the native provider returns for the `DBPROP_INIT_DATASOURCE,` and if that is empty, the native provider’s `DBPROP_DATASOURCENAME` is returned. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并显示它的一些只读属性。The following example creates an and displays some of its read-only properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.DataSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.DataSource Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.DataSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.DataSource Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit
.method public hidebysig instance void EnlistDistributedTransaction(class System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用方法在分布式事务中登记。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因为登记中的连接实例， **EnlistTransaction**利用中提供的功能用于管理命名空间的分布式事务，使其优于**EnlistDistributedTransaction**实现此目的。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose. 有关详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 你可以继续在现有使用分布式的事务中登记方法如果禁用自动登记。You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the method if auto-enlistment is disabled. 在现有分布式事务中登记可以确保，提交或回滚事务，如果数据源的代码所做的修改也提交或回滚。Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction makes sure that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back. 有关分布式事务的详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 如果返回的异常已经启动了事务使用。 returns an exception if the has already started a transaction using . 但是，如果该事务是在数据源启动的本地事务 (例如，通过显式执行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 语句使用对象)，回滚本地事务，并在现有登记作为请求的分布式的事务。However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an object), rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested. 不会收到通知，本地事务已回滚，并且负责不管理任何本地事务启动使用。You won't receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using .

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用方法在分布式事务中登记。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因为登记中的连接实例， **EnlistTransaction**利用中提供的功能用于管理命名空间的分布式事务，使其优于**EnlistDistributedTransaction**，使用对象。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction**, which uses a object. 它还具有略有不同的语义： 后显式事务上登记连接，不能取消登记或第一个事务完成之前在另一个事务中登记。It also has slightly different semantics: once a connection is explicitly enlisted on a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes. 有关分布式事务的详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md).

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.DataTable GetOleDbSchemaTable (Guid schema, object[] restrictions);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.DataTable GetOleDbSchemaTable(valuetype System.Guid schema, object[] restrictions) cil managed
Public Function GetOleDbSchemaTable (schema As Guid, restrictions As Object()) As DataTable
public: System::Data::DataTable ^ GetOleDbSchemaTable(Guid schema, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ restrictions);

param.name: schema
param.span: 的值之一，它指定要返回的架构表。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the schema table to return.

param.name: restrictions

span.span: An array of restriction values.

param.span: 这些值按照限制列的顺序来应用。

span.span: These are applied in the order of the restriction columns.

param.span: 即，第一个限制值应用于第一个限制列，第二个限制值应用于第二个限制列，依此类推。

span.span: That is, the first restriction value applies to the first restriction column, the second restriction value applies to the second restriction column, and so on.

summary.span: 应用了指定的限制之后，按照 GUID 的指示从数据源返回架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information from a data source as indicated by a GUID, and after it applies the specified restrictions.

returns.span: 一个包含所请求的架构信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the requested schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为返回的架构表具有相同的格式与指定的 OLE DB 架构行集`schema`参数。The schema table is returned as a that has the same format as the OLE DB schema rowset specified by the `schema` parameter. 使用`restrictions`参数中返回的行进行过滤（例如，通过指定表名称、 类型、 所有者或架构的限制）。Use the `restrictions` parameter to filter the rows to be returned in the (for example, by specifying restrictions for table name, type, owner, or schema). 如果数组中传递的值，包括空字符串或包含 null 值，不包含值的数组元素。When you pass values in the array, include empty strings or nulls for array elements that do not contain values. 如果传递到一个空数组`restrictions`，返回所有行 （一个用于每个表） 在默认顺序。If you pass an empty array to `restrictions`, all rows (one for each table) are returned in default order. 数组中的值相对应的源表中列的顺序和。Values in the array correspond to the order of the columns in the source table and . 限制数组中的每个元素与架构行集中的相应列的内容。Each element in the restrictions array is compared with the content of the corresponding column in the schema rowset. 例如，与在行集中的第一列的限制数组中的第一个元素进行比较。For example, the first element in the restrictions array is compared to first column in the rowset. 如果限制元素不为 null，只有与该限制的值完全匹配的行从架构行集将添加到生成。If a restriction element is not null, only rows from the schema rowset that exactly match the value of the restriction are added to the resulting . 方法调用基础 OLE DB **idbschemarowset:: Getrowset**方法使用标准公共语言运行时转换规则。The method calls the underlying OLE DB **IDBSchemaRowset::GetRowset** method using standard common language runtime conversion rules. 有关详细信息，请参阅[COM 数据类型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f93ae35d-a416-4218-8700-c8218cc90061)。For more information, see [COM Data Types](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f93ae35d-a416-4218-8700-c8218cc90061). 可以使用检索文字信息。You can retrieve information about literals by using . 这提供了信息等效于调用 OLE DB **IDBInfo::GetLiteralInfo**接口或 ADO **Connection.OpenSchema**方法替换`adSchemaDBInfoLiterals`常量。This provides information equivalent to calling the OLE DB **IDBInfo::GetLiteralInfo** interface, or the ADO **Connection.OpenSchema** method with the `adSchemaDBInfoLiterals` constant. ## Examples 下面的示例返回数据库中的表的列表。The following sample returns a list of tables in a database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.GetOleDbSchemaTable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.GetOleDbSchemaTable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.GetOleDbSchemaTable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.GetOleDbSchemaTable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The specified set of restrictions is invalid.
The is closed.

exception.span: OLE DB 提供程序不支持指定的架构行集合。

span.span: The specified schema rowset is not supported by the OLE DB provider.
-or-

exception.span: 参数包含 的值， 参数包含一条或多条限制。

span.span: The parameter contains a value of and the parameter contains one or more restrictions.
Connecting to Data Sources

summary.span: 返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this .

summary.span: 返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String) As DataTable

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

summary.span: 通过使用架构名称的指定字符串，返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`collectionName`指定为 null，将包含有关可用的所有元数据和其限制的信息。When `collectionName` is specified as null, the will contain information about all the metadata that is available, and its restrictions.

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: override System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 为请求的架构指定一组限制值。

span.span: Specifies a set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 通过使用指定字符串作为架构名称，指定字符串数组作为限制值，返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`collectionName`指定为 null，将包含有关可用的所有元数据和其限制的信息。When `collectionName` is specified as null, the will contain information about all the metadata that is available, and its restrictions. `restrictionValues`参数可以提供*n*深度的值指定的特定集合的限制集合。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 若要将值设置给定的限制，并且未设置其他限制的值，需要将前面的限制，则为 null，然后将放在你想要为指定值的限制为适当的值。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 此示例是"表"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果想要返回仅具有所有者"Carl"相关联的表，以及"Tables"集合存在三个限制 （数据库、 所有者和表名称），则必须传递 （至少） 以下值： null、"Carl"。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions (database, owner, and table name), and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl," you must pass in the following values (at a minimum): null, "Carl". 如果未传入限制值，默认值用于该限制。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 这将是相同的映射与传入 null，这是传入空字符串作为参数值不同。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在这种情况下，空字符串 ("") 被视为可指定参数的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter.

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event InfoMessage As OleDbInfoMessageEventHandler

summary.span: 在提供程序发送警告或信息性消息时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the provider sends a warning or an informational message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要处理警告或信息性消息，由服务器发送客户端应创建委托来侦听此事件。Clients that want to process warnings or informational messages sent by the server should create an delegate to listen to this event. 事件发生时从数据源返回严重性为低的消息。The event occurs when a message with low severity is returned from the data source. 低严重性消息是指那些不会导致异常。Low severity messages are those that do not cause an exception. 这包括错误消息严重级别小于或等于 10 的 Microsoft SQL serverFor Microsoft SQL Server, this includes error messages that have a severity of 10 or less 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[连接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information and an example, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Open() cil managed

summary.span: 使用由 指定的属性设置打开一个数据库连接。

span.span: Opens a database connection with the property settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘制从连接池中的打开的连接，如果有可用。The draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available. 否则，它在建立与数据源的新连接。Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to the data source. 您可以打开多个 DataReader 的单个。You can open more than one DataReader on a single . 如果您使用的 OLEDB 访问接口不支持在单个连接上多个活动的 DataReader，OLEDB 访问接口将为每个隐式打开其他连接。If the OLEDB provider you use does not support more than one active DataReader on a single connection, the OLEDB provider implicitly opens an additional connection for each. > [!NOTE] > 如果超出范围，它没有闭合。If the goes out of scope, it is not closed. 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用或**Dispose**，或使用中的连接中`Using`语句。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling or **Dispose**, or using the connection within a `Using` statement.

span.span: The connection is already open.

exception.span: 打开连接时出现的连接级别错误。

span.span: A connection-level error occurred while opening the connection.
Connecting to Data Sources

public: property System::String ^ Provider { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: The name of the provider as specified in the "Provider= " clause of the connection string.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建并显示它的一些只读属性。The following example creates an and displays some of its read-only properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Provider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Provider Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Provider Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.Provider Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ReleaseObjectPool() cil managed

summary.span: 指示可在释放最后一个基础连接时释放 对象池。

span.span: Indicates that the object pool can be released when the last underlying connection is released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReleaseObjectPool` 可以将否则保留为共用的释放资源调用对象。`ReleaseObjectPool` can be called to free resources that would otherwise be reserved for pooled objects. 您可能想要如果为例，连接对象将不会使用 OLE DB services 通常将入池的连接活动的时间量内再次调用此方法。You might want to call this method if, for example, the connection object will not be used again for the amount of time that OLE DB services ordinarily keeps pooled connections active. 请注意，仅仅调用此方法不会实际释放位于池中的活动连接。Note that calling the method alone does not actually release the active connections that exist in the pool. 最后释放该池之前，必须执行以下操作：The following must occur before the pool is finally disposed: 1. 调用以返回到池的连接对象。Call to return the connection object to the pool. 2. 允许每个池的超时的连接对象。Allow each connection object to time out of the pool. 3. 调用 。Call . 4. 调用垃圾回收。Invoke garbage collection. 相反，如果调用上的所有活动连接，并调用垃圾回收，但不是调用，保留用于共用的对象将保持可用的资源。Conversely, if you call on all active connections, and invoke garbage collection, but do not call , the resources reserved for the pooled objects will remain available. ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 将其打开、 显示的某些属性、 关闭的连接和释放对象池，以节省资源。The following example creates an , opens it, displays some of its properties, closes the connection, and releases the object pool to conserve resources. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.ReleaseObjectPool Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.ReleaseObjectPool Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.ReleaseObjectPool Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.ReleaseObjectPool Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources
Understanding Connection Pooling

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetState() cil managed

summary.span: 更新 对象的 属性。

span.span: Updates the property of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 OLE DB 访问接口可以检查该连接的当前状态。Some OLE DB providers can check the current state of the connection. 例如，如果数据库服务器已回收以来您打开你，则属性将继续返回`Open`。For example, if the database server has recycled since you opened your , the property will continue to return `Open`. 如果您正在使用 OLE DB 访问接口支持轮询有关此信息的实时连接，则调用方法，然后选中属性会告诉您连接不再处于打开状态。If you are working with an OLE DB Provider that supports polling for this information on a live connection, calling the method and then checking the property will tell you that the connection is no longer open. 方法依赖于 OLE DB 提供程序中以验证连接的当前状态的功能。The method relies on functionality in the OLE DB Provider to verify the current state of the connection. 若要确定在 OLE DB 访问接口是否支持此功能，请检查有关 DBPROP_CONNECTIONSTATUS 信息的提供商的文档。To determine if your OLE DB Provider supports this functionality, check the provider's documentation for information on DBPROP_CONNECTIONSTATUS.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ServerVersion As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ServerVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个包含客户端所连接到的服务器的版本的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the version of the server to which the client is connected.
The version of the connected server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性映射到 OLE DB DBPROP_DBMSVER 属性。The property maps to the OLE DB DBPROP_DBMSVER property. 如果不支持由基础 OLE DB 提供程序，返回空字符串。If is not supported by the underlying OLE DB provider, an empty string is returned. 版本是窗体 *# #。 # #。 # # #*，其中前两个数字是否为主要版本，接下来的两位数字是次版本，而最后四个数字是否为发布版本。The version is of the form *##.##.####*, where the first two digits are the major version, the next two digits are the minor version, and the last four digits are the release version. 提供程序必须呈现此窗体中的产品版本，但也可以附加的特定于产品的版本 — 例如，"04.01.0000 Rdb 4.1"。The provider must render the product version in this form but can also append the product-specific version—for example, "04.01.0000 Rdb 4.1". 字符串的形式*major.minor.build*，其中主要和次要恰好由两位数字，生成是四位数字。The string is of the form *major.minor.build*, where major and minor are exactly two digits and build is exactly four digits. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并显示它的一些只读属性。The following example creates an and displays some of its read-only properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.ServerVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.ServerVersion Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbConnection.ServerVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbConnection.ServerVersion Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The connection is closed.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property State As ConnectionState
public: virtual property System::Data::ConnectionState State { System::Data::ConnectionState get(); };

summary.span: 获取连接的当前状态。

span.span: Gets the current state of the connection.
A bitwise combination of the values.
The default is Closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面被允许的状态更改：The following are allowed state changes: - 从`Closed`到`Open`，并使用方法的对象。From `Closed` to `Open`, using the method of the object. - 从`Open`到`Closed`，使用方法或**释放**方法对象。From `Open` to `Closed`, using either the method or the **Dispose** method of the object. > [!NOTE] > 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，调用属性增加应用程序开销，因为每次调用导致的 OLE DB DBPROP_CONNECTIONSTATUS 属性打开的连接进行的调用。In previous version of the .NET Framework, calling the property increased application overhead because each call caused a call to the OLE DB DBPROP_CONNECTIONSTATUS property for an open connection. 随着.NET Framework 2.0 的发布，这不再是问题。With the release of the .NET Framework 2.0, this is no longer an issue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
